titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Torceter in the countie of Northampton the 8. of Iune, Anno Dom. 1588. at the visitation of the right reuerend Father in God, the Bishop of Peeterborow, by Iohn Beatniffe preacher of the woord of God in Brackley.
titleStmt.author: Beatniffe, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Charlewood for Roger VVard,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; leaves A4 and A5 lacking, supplied in photostat.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
